entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then light this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023
